text: John J. Broadmeadow (born 1961) is a lieutenant general in the United States Marine Corps, who served as Director of the Marine Corps Staff. He previously served as the Deputy Commander of United States Transportation Command. Broadmeadow was commissioned upon graduating from Norwich University in 1983.https://valor.militarytimes.com/hero/43700https://www.mcicom.marines.mil/News/News1/Article/1597552/majgen- broadmeadow-assumes-command-of-mcicom/ ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Norwich University alumni Category:Webster University alumni Category:United States Army War College alumni Category:United States Marine Corps generals
title: John J. Broadmeadow
